name: 0x524C-AILURUS
description:
Thanks for checking out 0x524C-AILURUS!

The source code for the game is here: https://github.com/aschuhardt/0x524C-AILURUS

So far the things that work are:

  • Message system
  • Map generation
  • User interface
  • Movement controls

The following are things I'd like to add but didn't have time to during this game jam:

  • NPCs
  • Combat
  • Items
  • Player progression

As you can probably tell, I didn't get as far on this project as I'd have liked to.  Considering this was my first game jam though I am pretty satisfied with it, and inspired to continue work on it going forward.

Feedback is appreciated!
